title: Vuelta a España Route Serves Up Mix of Vertical and Surprises for 2024
content:
The Spanish grand tour features two time trials, nine mountaintop finales, and plenty of action in between Lisbon and Madrid. Ideal for a Sepp Kuss title defense?

Read the full article at Vuelta a España Route Serves Up Mix of Vertical and Surprises for 2024 on Velo.
author: ahood
